casebody.data:
HEYE, Respondent, v. TILFORD et al., Appellants. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. February 16, 1894.) Action by Gustave Heye, as surviving executor, etc., against Henry M. 'Tilford and others. '

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. X, and O’BRIEN arid FOLLETT, XT.

,P. B. Olney, for appellants. ,E. B. Hill,:for respondent.

No opinion. Order reversed, without costs, and motion granted upon payment of $10 costs, and upon condition that defendant pay the costs of the •action which had accrued at the time of the motion; costs to be taxed by cthe clerk.
